TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AuthenticationManager extends System.Object

summary.span: 管理在用戶端驗證 (Authentication) 處理期間所呼叫的驗證模組。

span.span: Manages the authentication modules called during the client authentication process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是靜態類別，可管理應用程式使用的驗證模組。 is a static class that manages the authentication modules that an application uses. 發出要求來保護資源，呼叫方法來取得執行個體將在後續要求中。When a request is made to protected resources, the calls the method to get an instance to use in subsequent requests. 來呼叫查詢的每個已註冊的驗證模組每個模組的方法。The queries each registered authentication module by calling the method for each module. 要傳回的第一個驗證模組執行個體用來驗證要求。The first authentication module to return an instance is used to authenticate the request. 模組可提供基本、 摘要式、 交涉，NTLM，並註冊 Kerberos 驗證類型預設。Modules that provide the basic, digest, negotiate, NTLM, and Kerberos authentication types are registered with the by default. 實作的其他驗證模組介面可以使用加入方法。Additional authentication modules that implement the interface can be added using the method. 已加入至清單的順序，會呼叫驗證模組。Authentication modules are called in the order in which they were added to the list. > [!NOTE] > Kerberos 和交涉驗證類型不支援 Windows 95/98 或 Windows NT 4.0 上。The Kerberos and negotiate authentication type is not supported on Windows 95/98 or Windows NT 4.0. ## Examples [!code-cpp[System.Net.Authentication#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CPP/custombasicauthentication.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Authentication#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CS/custombasicauthentication.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Authentication#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/VB/custombasicauthentication.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Net.Authorization Authenticate (string challenge, System.Net.WebRequest request, System.Net.ICredentials credentials);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Net.Authorization Authenticate(string challenge, class System.Net.WebRequest request, class System.Net.ICredentials credentials) cil managed
Public Shared Function Authenticate (challenge As String, request As WebRequest, credentials As ICredentials) As Authorization
public: static System::Net::Authorization ^ Authenticate(System::String ^ challenge, System::Net::WebRequest ^ request, System::Net::ICredentials ^ credentials);
static member Authenticate : string * System.Net.WebRequest * System.Net.ICredentials -> System.Net.Authorization

param.name: challenge
param.span: 要求，由網際網路資源所傳回。

span.span: The challenge returned by the Internet resource.
The that initiated the authentication challenge.
The associated with this request.

summary.span: 呼叫每個已註冊的驗證模組，找出第一個可以回應驗證要求的模組。

span.span: Calls each registered authentication module to find the first module that can respond to the authentication request.

returns.span: 類別的執行個體，含有授權嘗試的結果。

span.span: An instance of the class containing the result of the authorization attempt.

returns.span: 如果沒有驗證模組回應要求，這個方法會傳回 。

span.span: If there is no authentication module to respond to the challenge, this method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呼叫方法，直到其中一個模組會以回應每個已註冊的驗證模組在執行個體。The method calls the method on each registered authentication module until one of the module responds with an instance. 第一個傳回執行個體用來驗證要求。The first instance returned is used to authenticate the request. 如果沒有驗證模組可以驗證要求，方法會傳回`null`。If no authentication module can authenticate the request, the method returns `null`. 向註冊的順序呼叫驗證模組。Authentication modules are called in the order in which they are registered with the .

span.span: is .
-or- is .
-or- is .

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Net.ICredentialPolicy CredentialPolicy { get; set; }
.property class System.Net.ICredentialPolicy CredentialPolicy
Public Shared Property CredentialPolicy As ICredentialPolicy
public: static property System::Net::ICredentialPolicy ^ CredentialPolicy { System::Net::ICredentialPolicy ^ get(); void set(System::Net::ICredentialPolicy ^ value); };
member this.CredentialPolicy : System.Net.ICredentialPolicy with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定用於資源要求 (使用 類別所提出) 的認證原則。

span.span: Gets or sets the credential policy to be used for resource requests made using the class.

value.span: 實作 介面的物件，判斷認證是否與要求一起傳送。

span.span: An object that implements the interface that determines whether credentials are sent with requests.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 認證原則會決定是否要傳送網路資源，例如 Web 網頁內容的要求時傳送的認證。The credential policy determines whether to send credentials when sending a request for a network resource, such as the content of a Web page. 如果傳送認證，需要用戶端驗證的伺服器可以嘗試驗證用戶端，而不是傳送回應，指出用戶端憑證必要在收到要求時。If credentials are sent, servers that require client authentication can attempt to authenticate the client when the request is received instead of sending a response indicating that the client's credentials are required. 而這會儲存到伺服器來回行程，這必須平衡跨網路傳送認證的固有的安全性風險。While this saves a round trip to the server, this must be balanced against the security risk inherent in sending credentials across the network. 目的地伺服器不需要用戶端驗證時最好不傳送認證。When the destination server does not require client authentication it is best to not send credentials. 認證原則將會呼叫只會針對要求指定的認證或不使用物件，指定認證。The credential policy will be called only for requests that specify credentials or use a object that specifies credentials. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何設定認證原則。The following code example demonstrates setting the credential policy. [!code-cpp[NclCredPolicy#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCredPolicy/CPP/NCLCredPolicy.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[NclCredPolicy#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCredPolicy/CS/websample.cs#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Collections.Specialized.StringDictionary CustomTargetNameDictionary { get; }
.property class System.Collections.Specialized.StringDictionary CustomTargetNameDictionary
Public Shared ReadOnly Property CustomTargetNameDictionary As StringDictionary
public: static property System::Collections::Specialized::StringDictionary ^ CustomTargetNameDictionary { System::Collections::Specialized::StringDictionary ^ get(); };
member this.CustomTargetNameDictionary : System.Collections.Specialized.StringDictionary

summary.span: 取得包含服務主要名稱 (SPN) 的字典，在使用 Kerberos 驗證要求 (使用 及其衍生類別所提出) 期間，這些服務主要名稱用來識別主機。

span.span: Gets the dictionary that contains Service Principal Names (SPNs) that are used to identify hosts during Kerberos authentication for requests made using and its derived classes.

value.span: 可寫入的 ，包含由主機資訊所組成之索引鍵的 SPN 值。

span.span: A writable that contains the SPN values for keys composed of host information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SPN 是用戶端用於唯一識別服務或應用程式進行相互驗證的伺服器上的執行個體的名稱。An SPN is a name by which a client uniquely identifies an instance of a service or application on a server for purposes of mutual authentication. 根據預設，要求相互驗證，而您可以藉由設定要求它至在您的要求。Mutual authentication is requested by default, and you can require it by setting to in your request. 當需要相互驗證，SPN，如用戶端必須提供目的地。When a requires mutual authentication, the SPN for the destination must be supplied by the client. 如果您知道 SPN，您可以將它加入傳送要求之前。If you know the SPN, you can add it to the before sending the request. 如果您不到此字典中，加入 SPN 資訊使用方法來撰寫最可能的 SPN; 不過，這是計算的值，而且可能不正確。If you have not added SPN information to this dictionary, the uses the method to compose the most likely SPN; however, this is a computed value and might be incorrect. 如果相互驗證嘗試失敗，您可以檢查字典，以便判斷計算的 SPN。If mutual authentication is attempted and fails, you can check the dictionary to determine the computed SPN. 沒有 SPN 會輸入到字典中，如果驗證通訊協定不支援相互驗證。No SPN is entered into the dictionary if the authentication protocol does not support mutual authentication. 若要將 SPN 值新增到此字典，使用的做為索引鍵。To add an SPN value to this dictionary, use the of the as the key. 就內部而言，索引鍵被截斷成， ，而如果不是預設通訊埠。Internally, the key is truncated to include the , , and the if it is not the default port. > [!NOTE] > 存取方法和屬性需要無限制。Accessing the methods and properties of the requires unrestricted . > [!NOTE] > 透過 proxy 執行 Kerberos 驗證時，必須加以解決 spn proxy 和最終主機名稱。When Kerberos authentication is performed through a proxy, both the proxy and the ultimate host name need to be resolved to an SPN. Proxy 名稱解析受保護的逾時。The proxy name resolution is protected by a timeout. 為 spn 的最終的主機名稱解析所需的 DNS 查詢，並沒有直接關聯這項作業的逾時。Resolution of the ultimate host name to a SPN requires a DNS lookup, and there is no timeout associated directly with this operation. 因此同步作業可能需要較長逾時。Therefore synchronous operations may take longer to timeout. 若要解決這個問題，將 ultimate 主機的 URI 前置詞加入 SPN 快取之前提出要求。To overcome this, add the ultimate host's URI prefix to the SPN cache prior to making requests to it. 如果未設定 屬性，版本 3.5 SP1 現在預設成指定 NTLM (NT LAN Manager) 驗證交換時 SPN 之要求 URL 中所使用的主機名稱。Version 3.5 SP1 now defaults to specifying the host name used in the request URL in the SPN in the NTLM (NT LAN Manager) authentication exchange when the property is not set. 要求 URL 中所使用的主機名稱可能不同於用戶端要求的 中所指定的主機標頭。The host name used in the request URL may be different from the Host header specified in the in the client request. 要求 URL 中所使用的主機名稱可能不同於伺服器的實際主機名稱、伺服器的電腦名稱、電腦的 IP 位址或迴路位址。The host name used in the request URL may be different from the actual host name of the server, the machine name of the server, the computer's IP address, or the loopback address. 在這些情況下，Windows 會讓驗證要求失敗。In these cases, Windows will fail the authentication request. 若要解決這個問題，您可能需要通知使用主機名稱的 Windows 用戶端在要求 URL 中要求 ("contoso"，例如) 是實際的本機電腦的替代名稱。To address the issue, you may need to notify Windows that the host name used in the request URL in the client request ("contoso", for example) is actually an alternate name for the local computer. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何顯示的內容。The following code example demonstrates displaying the contents of the . [!code-cpp[NclCredPolicy#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCredPolicy/CPP/NCLCredPolicy.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[NclCredPolicy#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCredPolicy/CS/websample.cs#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Net.Authorization PreAuthenticate (System.Net.WebRequest request, System.Net.ICredentials credentials);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Net.Authorization PreAuthenticate(class System.Net.WebRequest request, class System.Net.ICredentials credentials) cil managed
Public Shared Function PreAuthenticate (request As WebRequest, credentials As ICredentials) As Authorization
public: static System::Net::Authorization ^ PreAuthenticate(System::Net::WebRequest ^ request, System::Net::ICredentials ^ credentials);
static member PreAuthenticate : System.Net.WebRequest * System.Net.ICredentials -> System.Net.Authorization

span.span: A to an Internet resource.
The associated with the request.
Preauthenticates a request.

returns.span: 如果可以預先驗證要求，則為 類別的執行個體，否則為 。

span.span: An instance of the class if the request can be preauthenticated; otherwise, .

returns.span: 如果 為 ，這個方法會傳回 。

span.span: If is , this method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果驗證模組可以預先驗證要求，方法會傳回驗證執行個體，並將授權資訊傳送至聯合國而不是等待要發出的挑戰的資源伺服器。If the authentication module can preauthenticate the request, the method returns an Authentication instance and sends the authorization information to the server preemptively instead of waiting for the resource to issue a challenge. 此行為述 RFC 2617 的 3.3 節 (HTTP 驗證： 基本與摘要式存取驗證)。This behavior is outlined in section 3.3 of RFC 2617 (HTTP Authentication: Basic and Digest Access Authentication). 支援預先驗證的驗證模組會讓用戶端藉由避免發生驗證問題所造成的額外往返改善伺服器效能。Authentication modules that support preauthentication allow clients to improve server efficiency by avoiding extra round trips caused by authentication challenges. 授權模組可以預先驗證會要求組屬性`true`。Authorization modules that can preauthenticate requests set the property to `true`.

span.span: is .

span.span: The to register with the authentication manager.

summary.span: 使用驗證管理員註冊驗證模組。

span.span: Registers an authentication module with the authentication manager.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將驗證模組加入至所呼叫的模組清單的結尾方法。The method adds authentication modules to the end of the list of modules called by the method. 已加入至清單的順序，會呼叫驗證模組。Authentication modules are called in the order in which they were added to the list. 如果具有相同的模組是已註冊，這個方法會移除已註冊的模組，並且加入`authenticationModule`到清單的結尾。If a module with the same is already registered, this method removes the registered module and adds `authenticationModule` to the end of the list. ## Examples 下列範例會使用驗證管理員註冊驗證模組。The following example registers an authentication module with the authentication manager. 如需完整範例，請參閱類別。For a complete example, refer to the class. [!code-cpp[System.Net.Sockets.Authentication#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.Authentication/CPP/custombasicauthentication.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Sockets.Authentication#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.Authentication/CS/custombasicauthentication.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Sockets.Authentication#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.Authentication/VB/custombasicauthentication.vb#2)]

value.span: ，啟用要讀取之已註冊的驗證模組。

span.span: An that enables the registered authentication modules to be read.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性提供，可讓清單執行個體註冊驗證模組來讀取。The property provides an instance that enables the list of registered authentication modules to be read. 方法會將模組新增至清單中，而方法將從中移除模組。The method adds modules to the list, and the method removes modules from it. ## Examples 下列範例會使用屬性來取得驗證管理員註冊的驗證模組的清單。The following example uses the property to get a list of authentication modules that are registered with the authentication manager. 如需完整範例，請參閱類別。For a complete example, refer to the class. [!code-cpp[System.Net.Authentication#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CPP/custombasicauthentication.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Authentication#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CS/custombasicauthentication.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Authentication#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/VB/custombasicauthentication.vb#8)]

span.span: Removes authentication modules from the list of registered modules.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法所呼叫的驗證模組清單中移除指定的驗證模組方法。The method removes the specified authentication module from the list of authentication modules called by the method. 此模組必須已加入至清單使用方法之前，它可以從清單中移除。The module must have been added to the list using the method before it can be removed from the list. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法的已登錄的模組清單中移除指定的驗證模組。The following example uses the method to remove the specified authentication module from the list of registered modules. 如需完整範例，請參閱類別。For a complete example, refer to the class.
